channel.title: Xen?
channel.description: I was wondering if Xen will be released for the free version. The dev team said that they will not stop supporting the free version of the game, and I was wondering if that meant that they will release Xen for free as well. I am sorry if this question is repetitive, but I cant find anything to help me. Thank you for your time.

item.title: Xen?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
The free version is going to remain as-is (except for some bug fixes). You will need the retail version for Xen (when itâ€™s done), multiplayer, and so forth.
